com.samsung.android.sdk.motion

Class SmotionPedometer.Info

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionPedometer.Info
  • Enclosing class:
    SmotionPedometer

    public static class SmotionPedometer.Info
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the pedometer event information and provides methods to access it.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COUNT_RUN_DOWN
      Pedometer count for running downhill.
      static int COUNT_RUN_FLAT
      Pedometer count for running on a flat surface.

      Pedometer count for running uphill.
      static int COUNT_TOTAL
      Total pedometer count, which is the sum of the walk and run counts.

      Pedometer count for walking downhill.

      • SmotionPedometer.Info

        public SmotionPedometer.Info()
        Creates a SmotionPedometer.Info instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support SmotionPedometer or the SmotionPedometer instance is not created.
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeStamp

        public long getTimeStamp()
        Get the timestamp in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        The time in nanoseconds when the event occurred.

        Use the timestamp to measure the event duration by comparing it against another timestamp from the same process on the same device. Values returned by this method do not have a defined correspondence to wall clock times the zero value is typically whenever the device last booted. You can use System.currentTimeMillis() to get the time.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Get the step speed.
        Returns:
        The step speed.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Get the cumulative distance traveled since the last reboot when at least one listener is added.
        Returns:
        The cumulative distance traveled.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getCalorie

        public double getCalorie()
        Get the cumulative calories consumed since the last reboot when at least one listener is added.
        Returns:
        The cumulative calories expended.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Get the step status. You can use this value to determine what the user is doing based on the motion events.
        Returns:
        The step status. The valid values are:

        STATUS_RUN_DOWN

        STATUS_RUN_FLAT

        STATUS_RUN_UP

        STATUS_STOP

        STATUS_WALK_DOWN

        STATUS_WALK_FLAT

        STATUS_WALK_UP

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getCount

        public long getCount(int type)
        Get the cumulative step count by type since the last reboot when at least one listener is added.
        Parameters:
        type - The count type you want to retrieve.The valid values are:

        COUNT_RUN_DOWN

        COUNT_RUN_FLAT

        COUNT_RUN_UP

        COUNT_STOP

        COUNT_WALK_DOWN

        COUNT_WALK_FLAT

        COUNT_WALK_UP

        Returns:
        The number of steps taken by type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the type passed is not valid.
        Since:
        1.0.0
